EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Sweet Software Group Training - Ankeny, IA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Confirmation: Sweet Software Group Training - Ankeny, IA
Thank you for registering the for Sweet Software Group Training in Ankeny, IA on April 24-25, 2012. This is your confirmation email. A reminder will be sent later as the date gets closer.
If you selected credit card payment, a TriTech representative will contact you for your payment information.
If you have questions or if there is anything we can help with to make this a better experience for you, please contact us at:
Kathy Swanson, Ankeny Fire Department: (515) 365-6476 | kswanson@ankenyiowa.gov
Brenda Taylor, TriTech Sales Representative: (800) 537-3927 ext. 6233 |brenda.taylor@TriTech.com
**Tritech retains the right to cancel this event 30 days prior if registrations are below the minimum required.**
TRAINING LOCATION: Ankeny Fire Station #1 (120 NW Ash Dr., Ankeny, IA 50023)
RECOMMENDED HOTEL: Courtyard by Marriott (2405 Southeast Creekview Drive, Ankeny, IA 50021) | Phone: (515) 422-555 | $139-189 per night plus tax
AGENDA: Download Sample Training Agenda <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf" target="_blank>
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com <http://www.tritech.com>
<http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839" target="_blank"> <ahref="http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware" target="_blank>
9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
